entry.title: Friday: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
